entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 54 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
